main event: Two bright red objects were observed moving from horizon to horizon in 12 to 15 seconds at Chase Field, Beeville, Texas.
interesting points: The objects were described as shooting star bright and red in color., The sighting lasted for about 2-3 seconds., The objects moved at speeds comparable to common jet aircraft., There were conflicting conclusions regarding the nature of the objects, considering them possibly as meteorites or aircraft., The observation was made by Navy and Marine Corps personnel.
witness description: Navy and Marine Corps personnel, including a Jet Instrument Instructor and a student pilot.
